website_summaries.verdict: This model made noticeable improvements in obstacle detection and its camera but kept its budget price.
pros: One of the most user-friendly, this drone is up and running and ready to fly with little room for user error or glitches
Features 4K video and takes quality photos
cons: Wide shots might be blurry around the edges

customer_reviews.title: Worst customer service I've ever dealt with
customer_reviews.text: I love my DJI Phantom 3 Pro. It's pricey but so much fun! Edit: After having the drone for a few months, I updated to a recommended firmware and the DJI is no unusable. I have looked everywhere for a fix and tried everything to roll back to previous firmware and it still doesn't work. My biggest issue is that I called customer service, and not only was the guy who I spoke with VERY rude, he hung up on me. I was never rude to him even though he was extremely condescending. I am disappointed that I gave this company my business. So beware!
customer_reviews.author: John J Burns III

customer_reviews.title: Nothing but Problems
customer_reviews.text: I got this drone for my husband for Christmas and he had problems with it from day one!!! It had to be sent back to DJI for $238 repair ( under warranty) He got it back about 2 weeks ago and it’s still having the same problem ( Green and Black Screen ) I started reading reviews / U-tube videos Etc and seems everyone has had the same problem!! Very frustrated and disappointed in this product and it seems someone needs to figure out what is doing on!! At this point I would not recommend this product to anyone. Getting ready to send it back to DJI for the 2nd time.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy DJI, poor customer support, product fails
customer_reviews.text: P3P. Firmware update kills live camera view. Can't fly blind. Its now a paperweight. Sent to DJI for fix, they say the "gimbal" needs replacement. Nothing is wrong with gimbal, everything works. It still records photos and video, and pans up down left right. But there in no live transmission signal. Read the forums at DJI. Filled with owners reporting the same issue. DJI doesn't care. DJI wants $300 to replace gimbal/camera. Won't cover under 1 year warranty. DO NOT buy a DJI product. They do not honor warranty. They do not care about customer support.
customer_reviews.author: thenpm

customer_reviews.title: Useless
customer_reviews.text: Terrible product! Zero stars is more appropriate. Software-DJI go - would not initiate drone recognition/registration. Drone sits there and flashes and makes noise. Their software should be more user friendly and firmware updates shouldn't need a computer science degree to be accomplished. $800 paperweight! Their "support " -couldn't get through to them. Useless. Returned for a refund. Going to look more into Autelrobotics which is American made and supported.
customer_reviews.author: Badawg

customer_reviews.title: Loved the product (what I actually recieved of my order ...
customer_reviews.text: Loved the product (what I actually recieved of my order that is), hate the company from which it was purchased. I ordered the Phantom with case and extra battery. The shipment I recieved did not contain the extra battery. I notified the company at 3 three times and was told each time, in professional language, that I was lying and the battery was in the package. No resolution, no battery, very unhappy consumer. Will never order from this company again. Buyer beware! I wish I had heeded the advice of other reviewers giving this product a low rating.
customer_reviews.author: Aezjh

customer_reviews.title: says no signal
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed, after half year of non-use, copter just stop show image on my phone, says no signal... and now I have to send it to Dji ,because if you not turn it on for a long time, it just losing some information from main controller, this camera gumball it's about $340
customer_reviews.author: Westbuyer

customer_reviews.title: OUTDATED AND UNSUPPORTED.  DON'T BUY.
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving it one star because I cannot give it zero stars. The product is not supported by the DJI app and the one I got wouldn't turn on. Forget about getting support from DJI, they are impossible to reach. The product looks like it's made well, but this version is outdated and not supported any longer, so I don't know why Amazon is selling them. The Phantom 4 is too expensive. I didn't feel like spending so much money on this type of product and considering that you cannot get support from DJI, I would consider buying anything from DJI.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Rodriquez

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work as promised
customer_reviews.text: Problematic unit, poor support, complete waste of money. I should have paid more attention to the reviews..... Had I really read more of them, I would have purchased another unit instead of wasting my money on this unit. The support for this (non working unit) has been terrible and it was months to get resolved and returned to me (today) only to find out they did NOT fix the issue. Customer support is horrible.
customer_reviews.author: Jonathan S

customer_reviews.title: customer service sucks
customer_reviews.text: Love the machine! - customer support - not so much. I purchased the Phantom 3 Pro bundle kit -- the extra battery I received would not take a charge. after contacting DJI support I was told I would need to return the battery for repair. RETURN FOR REPAIR? I just bought a new battery and it is defective, it needs to be replaced! -- Nope - not their policy. Wait for a shipping label, ship it, wait 5-7 days for return process and wait for it to be shipped back. I bought the bundle so I could fly more than 23 minutes a day. Should have listened to the reviews.
customer_reviews.author: marc clark

customer_reviews.title: Good drone for the money
customer_reviews.text: This is a great drone. The size nice, as it is not one of the small flimsy cheap drones. It feels pretty substantial, especially for a "starter" drone. It is called a professional drone and I would agree with that. It is very easy to control and holds steady, even in light breeze. I would not suggest flying this one when it is windy, though. The pictures and video from this drone is very good quality and the camera is easy to operate once you get used to the controls. My suggestion would be to take this to a football or soccer field and practice flying this before going full on flying.
customer_reviews.author: MajorDrake

customer_reviews.title: 2 defective transmitters in a row
customer_reviews.text: The first time I hit hte Return to Home button, it broke off of the inside of the transmitter. Found that it's a common issue, and was luckily able to return it to Amazon and get another quickly. I hit the Return Home button one time on the new one while flying, and that one broke at as. 2 transmitters, 2 broken buttons. This one is past the return time on Amazon, so it's going to take a couple of weeks to get it fixed.
customer_reviews.author: J. Knobloch

customer_reviews.title: Professional Drone with Great Image Capability.
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Very stable. Takes great photos and incredible video. Easy to fly. Could be used by a beginner or advanced hobbyist. Highly recommend following all safety protocols and installing needed firmware updates. My only complaint is that a friend and I ordered two at the same time from Amazon. He ordered his, I ordered mine. Paid the exact same price. He got the newer version and I received the older version. Not happy at all about that. :-/ I think it's great that they recognized weaknesses and they were corrected. I just think they should sell the obsolete model for less and offer the option.
customer_reviews.author: Michael S. Pittman

customer_reviews.title: $1300 paperweight
customer_reviews.text: The RC won't talk to the app. Have tried updating firmware on aircraft and remote, updated to newest app version, tried several devices and cables, tried talking to DJI customer support, they were no help, either couldn't understand them or they couldn't offer any advice other than update firmware and try a different cable. I will NOT be buying another DJI product.
customer_reviews.author: Kyler

customer_reviews.title: I love my drone
customer_reviews.text: I love my drone. I learned to fly drones on the cheap $40 versions but this is a toy that captures a childhood dream of mine. It isn't the most responsive drone but it has greatly increased the quality of my videos I make and I use it all the time. One of my favorite toys of all time.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Burt

customer_reviews.title: and I have used this for a ton of different scenarios and absolutely love it! The range is great
customer_reviews.text: I own a small aerial photography company and use this as one of my drones, and I have used this for a ton of different scenarios and absolutely love it! The range is great, but is obviously affected by other wireless and electrical interference like flying through a city. I have flown it over 3 miles straight out over water and it returns to home overtime it looses connection. I have had very few issues with it, and nothing catastrophic. Takes great pictures and the gimbal of the camera is pretty excellent. Just make sure you update the software before flying and fly somewhere open and with no obstacles around until you get very familiar with this.
customer_reviews.author: Freshsta42

customer_reviews.title: LOVE MY DRONE!
customer_reviews.text: Love my drone. Have had it for several months with no problems. Just make sure you check for updates while wifi is close and be sure to calibrate the compass and stuff, like it says in the manual. Follow the instructions to the letter and remember to do it before every session. Cant help but think some of the fly aways are due to incomplete or improper pre flight calibration. It is stressed in the instructions, but I wonder if people ignore it and just take off, then, when home button is pushed, it flies off. Anyway, this is an amazing piece of technology and I hope you get hours and hours of fun and footage!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Lappin

customer_reviews.title: Faulty drone crashed.
customer_reviews.text: I bought two drones for a project. One of them just crashed, no warnings during a very simple flight. We ended up losing the gimbal and camera lens. It was not worth repairing as we were not in the US and there was no way we could use the warranty. Something is probably wrong with the firmware. It's a shame since it was a significant investment for this organization and the device didn't respond.
customer_reviews.author: Ezequiel

customer_reviews.title: Perfect in every way.
customer_reviews.text: What can I say about this drone that hasn't been said before? I works great and so easy to fly but don't get to comfortable as you may end up being to cocky and crash it into a tree like I did once. Luckily I didn't break anything. I'm using the drone with an LG G-Pad 7" and it performs well but with the screen was brighter, this can be fixed with a hood for the controller some what. I would suggest getting a gimbal saver, lens cap/camera clap, hood, extra batteries, car charger, and filters for the camera. You will not be dissatisfied with this.
customer_reviews.author: TomV

customer_reviews.title: Damaged upon arrival - Not from shipping
customer_reviews.text: Box arrived in perfect condition. Everything was packaged very nicely. In preparing for my first flight, I noticed one of the motors was making a grinding noise when attaching the prop. I found a video on youtube that verified that it is a bad bearing in the motor itself. Glad I noticed it before I took it out to fly. This could have caused a crash! I would expect that something as simple as attaching the props and checking for smooth rotation would happen before these units ship out. I was planning on taking this on a trip and now I don't have time to get another before I leave. Super bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t ever buy DJI
customer_reviews.text: They are an abysmal company to work with. They feel like just because they’ve cornered the drone market, they can treat their customers like crap. I will never buy another product from DJI again.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Reich

customer_reviews.title: quadcopter is awesome
customer_reviews.text: the quadcopter is awesome ... the battery time not so much. they say it will last 28 minutes. Mine lasted 13 minutes. I tried everything to make it last longer turning off the lights, taking off slow, fully charging the battery letting it sit 30 minutes then flying it. Fully discharging the battery then charging it up. flying on calm days, nothing changed. I really liked the idea of owning this. Had fun flying it but, 13 minutes of fun is not enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: michael rodgers

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service, Not So Great Product :(
customer_reviews.text: On about my 10th flight I took it on about a 10 min flight and as I was bringing it back in it shut off about 150 feet in the air and crashed to the ground more or less destroying the entire drone. However, giving this a great review because other than that issue it operated as expected and was extremely fun and very easy to control. Also, seller gave me a full refund (As they should have) and wasn't a pain at all about it. Note: Malfunction occurred and refund was requested within 30 days of purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Kip

customer_reviews.title: ... (not an issue) as it was refurbished drone flies great however the sd card that came in the drone ...
customer_reviews.text: I received drone in wore out box (not an issue) as it was refurbished drone flies great however the sd card that came in the drone is some how invalid and I cannot record anything I have purchased a new sd card and am trying that but new card says it is write protected for some reason only reason I am not giving 5 stars is the invalid as card issue for that is the only reason I got the drone was to record and at the moment I cant do that
customer_reviews.author: Justin D.

customer_reviews.title: Does more than we'd hoped for!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a gift for husband and he loves it! It took a bit of watching videos for him to get the hang of it but our 15 year old Grandson mastered it in a matter of minutes! LOL It seems to work really well and my husband is super pleased with it. It was a great buy too with the hard case and an extra battery. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Texasgabby

customer_reviews.title: DJI: WORST CUSTOMER SERVICE EVER
customer_reviews.text: Other than the fact that my drone insurance covered the factory malfunction and replaced it(cost) i would 100% agree that they are not only pompous but a very uncaring, alibi-seeking outfit. They have BY FAR the worst customer care on earth! Cheap Chinese labor and making millions they dont give a rat's ass about their customers and are always passing the buck! My advice is to purchase the insurance and be covered...you will get NO HELP from DJI...
customer_reviews.author: Solaman

customer_reviews.title: Great quad
customer_reviews.text: This little drone is amazing follow the instructions and it is a very stable platform to fly. Follow the rules and everyone can enjoy getting video up to 400ft. The video quality is fantastic for the price of this unit. Great flight time 22 to 25 minutes is what I was getting. All the features worked great I brought it to a open area to try the return to home feature and it worked great. DJI is always updating sometimes for the good but sometimes they make things worse so hold back on updating firmware as long as possible to verify any bugs in the new releases that come out.
customer_reviews.author: Ken

customer_reviews.title: Wow!  Just wow!
customer_reviews.text: The DJI phantom 3 professional has not only out performed beyond my wildest expectations from a flight perspective, it has also passed the very critical scrutiny of my wife. She is a professional photographer and is extremely critical when it comes to her equipment. We could not be happier. The only down side or critical thing that I have to say is that the firmware updates are not enjoyable. They don't always take and you have to re-do them. Or worse ill go to travel and do some shooting only to find out that I should have updated. Otherwise this drone is a win and I always look forward to my next flight
customer_reviews.author: dana

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service not so good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the DJI Phantom 3 professional and when I assembled everything as suggested, one of the propellers would not unscrew without damaging something. I called DJI customer support and they said that was not covered under there warranty, rerurned it to amazon. You would think for $1300 you would get a little better service. Amazon was better to deal with than DJI, pretty dissapointed. Not sure if I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: mark63304

customer_reviews.title: Excellent drone in every way
customer_reviews.text: This drone is an incredible piece of technology. It's rock solid in the air to the point where I set the controller down and turn my back to it so I can film myself playing fetch with my dog. The camera quality is also outstanding. It's might be the highest quality video I have ever seen on my retina macbook. The price is surprising low given the performance and capabilities of the drone. One warning is avoid all contact with DJI if possible. Their customer service is absolutely terrible. Even knowing that I still had to give 5 stars because of the quality of the drone itself.
customer_reviews.author: Max

customer_reviews.title: Two versions of the software
customer_reviews.text: Would have given 5 stars however it took forever to get the thing working. After the remote and drone worked by themselves, turning on and showing that they were activated, I finally discovered that they did not have the same version of the software. I had to update the drone before it would work with the remote. Basically the two came from the same warehouse were in the same packaging and somehow had two different software updates.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene S

customer_reviews.title: Hooray!!
customer_reviews.text: We were initially disappointed because images being transferred to the computer from the memory card were pixelated and freeze framing... after trying several trouble shooting solutions from the manufacturer and other users online problem was still unresolved. Had the drone packed and ready to return for a refund thinking it was not working. A friend suggested upgrading the operating system from Mac OS from Lion to Yosemite and the problem was resolved. Shooting in 1080p rather than 4k was a further improvement because our Mac is a 2012 imac and the video specs do not support 4k. Keeping the drone. Very happy now. Loving this drone!!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Quality product. Versatile and fun.
customer_reviews.text: Works great. Unfortunately, not a lot of instruction for the drone or the dji go app. Unless you are familiar with both, there is a steep learning curve. Once you get the basics, there are many features to explore. Buy extra batteries, a gang charger and protective case.
customer_reviews.author: L. Neufeld

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed haven't had a chance to take it out of ...
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed haven't had a chance to take it out of the box until yesterday. Firmware update fails and no live feed form camera to iPad
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: great drone. practice a lot especially in the open ...
customer_reviews.text: great drone. practice a lot especially in the open field to avoid hitting objects. I been flying this now even with trees around as i am now use to the controls. no need to compete with 3dr Solo because of the cable, follow me and orbit features....with a lot of practice you can achieve that without those fancy features plus those features are software enabled so there are some glitches might occur that will enable the drone to act differently. I do orbit and selfie manually with this drone...great buy and hoping it will last long...
customer_reviews.author: Jojo Salvador

customer_reviews.title: This bundle was a great price when I got it for everything it has
customer_reviews.text: This bundle was a great price when I got it for everything it has. The case is a great quality and fits everything perfectly. Having the second battery is also very useful to have. The drone itself is awesome and is perfect if you want a nice quality drone and camera, but don't want to spend a ton on the phantom 4 or 4 pro. Overall I love the drone and the extras in the bundle, would definitely recommend this kit for starters as a case is pretty necessary.
customer_reviews.author: Ben G.

customer_reviews.title: DJI Phantom 3 Pro is a must have big boy toy...
customer_reviews.text: This was my first purchase of a Quadcopter and I have to say I love it. The ease of flying the Phantom 3 Professional is amazing even for a beginner. By using the DJI GO app with your devise it allows for a wealth of inflight information at your finger tips. Pictures are excellent with the 4K camera....definitely recommend DJI for your Quadcopter fun...
customer_reviews.author: David R

customer_reviews.title: Crashed for no reason
customer_reviews.text: Sent in for repair to dji CA. and the drone isn't able to be flown because video is unstable. I got a bad deal and have a pile of plastic and cash wasted !
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Florer Jr.

customer_reviews.title: I can certainly recommend this drone to anyone interested this hobby
customer_reviews.text: Very durable drone. I purchased this one to replace one that I had lost when I tried flying it in a wind storm. But, I was lucky enough to get back my original drone. Someone had found it on their property which was over 5 miles away from where I lost contact with it. The person who found it said it was upside down in the mud. I know that it had rained and snowed several times in the 2 weeks it was missing. All it took was a little cleaning and she flew again. I can certainly recommend this drone to anyone interested this hobby.
customer_reviews.author: 402craigw

customer_reviews.title: Not the Quadzimoto of quad rotors
customer_reviews.text: Very good quad trotor. Much easier to fly than a small quad (nano qx). You must be diligent in prepping for each flight. Recalibrate compass EVERY FLIGHT. I would not suggest flying indoors, especially without prop guards. Video quality is stunning, photos have lots of hot spots that have to be fixed in every shot. Especially noticeable in images with sky. I'm using a backpack to carry it around, but a case would be ideal. If you need 4K video then this is the quad for you.
customer_reviews.author: F1 Fan

customer_reviews.title: Best quad copter out there.
customer_reviews.text: I love this product I've researched different companies and DJI has the mall beat by miles. I've owned my phantom three professional for about three months and it's a very solid product. No regrets on this purchase. Here's a link to my latest video. [...]
customer_reviews.author: rick porter

customer_reviews.title: Highly Recommend, IMO best drone for the money on the market today!
customer_reviews.text: I am a tech geek for a living and have been in RC a long time and every time I fly this thing it blows my mind! This is my first FPV capable drone and it's unbelievably stable and high quality. I've had it for a couple weeks now and maybe have flown it 15-20 times. I can understand now why it's the industry standard. The build is the high quality you would expect and it's very easy to fly by anyone, even my 10 year old! I do believe this is the best mid-range drone for the money on the market today.
customer_reviews.author: Willie B.

customer_reviews.title: no extra battery included!
customer_reviews.text: good camera, no lens cover included. Has a beginners mode which is helpful to learn controlling the drone. Again extra battery was not there.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Amazing product. Not the greatest customer survice for laying ...
customer_reviews.text: Amazing product. Not the greatest customer survice for laying out $1,200.00 but it is a company based in China. Working on getting some firmware updates fixed with some difficulty(pix attached). The product is working perfectly but i want to fix this small (ocd extremely annoying) error. I'm working with a mac so take it or leave it. I live in albany ny and i would pay someone to get this working. Again 5 stars but take it easy at first. Side note I was able to make $200.00 filming some priorities. And if you own this, you will be spending money on extra stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew P.

customer_reviews.title: Unsatisfied
customer_reviews.text: The product didn't work and now they will not give me a full refund on the product.
customer_reviews.author: audie bible

customer_reviews.title: Works as advertised
customer_reviews.text: This quadcopter is smooth, very stable in flight. Home & Course Lock works as advertised. I regularly use the auto takeoff and auto land feature. Both work extremely well, even in high winds. To cast all doubts aside, I'm using my Samsung Note 5, and it works perfectly with the DJI Go App and the quadcopter itself. Video quality is at the professional level, even at 1080p resolution.
customer_reviews.author: kkrome25

customer_reviews.title: The good: The best video quadcopter on the market
customer_reviews.text: The good: The best video quadcopter on the market. More stable, higher quality footage than the solo with longer battery life and range. The bad: Too many components, so it's easy to forgot parts and lose shots. Video recording turns off on landing, and won't turn on on launch. The ugly: Propeller came scuffed, supposedly new in box (!!). Controller stopped connecting to android phone after 3 weeks. Device will not write to SD card after it has been inserted into any other device, even if the card is completely empty -- this is a design feature, and card must be formatted prior to every use.
customer_reviews.author: Timmy Burner

customer_reviews.title: Truly a professional drone.
customer_reviews.text: Not for beginners. Moderately difficult to learn to fly. I've crashed it twice that I had to send it back for repairs, but the cost wasn't too bad. Great pictures and videos, and that's what it's all about.
customer_reviews.author: Michael A.

customer_reviews.title: No Corporate  Support
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this copter four years ago. It has less than five hours on it. DGI doesn't service the software updates any longer, which grounded my drone.
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: Be patient...
customer_reviews.text: This product is very good so far. There was a bit of a learning curve with getting the latest software installed and a syncing the remotes. It took me 2 days to fly after reading a few blogs on issues others were having. The video quality is great with the 4K. It doesn't record audio though, so you will have to install your own mic somehow. There are blogs on that also. During windy conditions, it stayed stable with the GPS assisting. I would recommend this product, for commercial and recreational.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: so not to bad. I have NO previous experience flying an RC ...
customer_reviews.text: I have had the DJI Phantom 3 Professional Quadcopter for a month now and have only crashed it a few times. And each crash was from a few feet up, so not to bad. I have NO previous experience flying an RC anything at all and took to this quadcopter pretty good. Finally got my second battery and can now fly a good amount of time (40 or so min).
customer_reviews.author: Book Reader

customer_reviews.title: Not reliable, DJI does not stand by product
customer_reviews.text: worked fine for a while. After 18 months (past the 1 year warranty), after updating the controller’s firmware, it does with no response at all. DJI’s response is that I need to buy another controller. Not a good experience at all
customer_reviews.author: Faboza

customer_reviews.title: Easy to Fly
customer_reviews.text: I spent two weeks doing the simulator, watching the tutorials, and then reading the manuals all before first flight. Drone is crazy easy to fly. The video was very choppy but clear. I believe I have everything set up right too. Apparently the drone heats up the iPhone and it gets too hot that causes the choppy video. Love the drone, pictures are great. Videos aren't.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: Impressive machine with definite possibilities
customer_reviews.text: I bought this drone after using the Phantom 3 standard model. After a slight issue with a bad battery which was quickly replaced by the seller. The Phantom 3 pro is awesome. The first thing I noticed is the Pro feels beefier and definitely has more power. Haven't had much of a chance to use the different video settings. The DJI is an impressive machine. Visit CascoBaydrones.com
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Customer Service Outstanding
customer_reviews.text: Customer Service at DJI for our issue was off-the-charts great. We couldn't resolve the software issue so they sent a FEDEX label (prepaid) to get it to their facility in 2 days & then had it returned to us within just 10 days (no cost to us). THANK YOU DJI for taking such good care of us and turning the repair around so quickly! We all love this drone!
customer_reviews.author: jessand

customer_reviews.title: A Really good “Older” drone at a great price now!!!
customer_reviews.text: I like the drone and overall quality. I don’t like that the fact that it does not hover as good as my Mavic Pro Platinum or my Spark. A good “Older” drone that’s easy to fly and has a good camera and takes good video. Now at a Great price. A really great starter drone. Especially if you can use a larger size drone and don’t need all of the features on the newer models.
customer_reviews.author: Casey Jones

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Big Boys toy
customer_reviews.text: Amazing Big Boys toy. I can not compare to other million drones on the market but this is awesome for a regular guy like me that know just a little bit about technology, like every other average Joe. I have som much fun with it and also use it to record and shoot my construction projects. Customers love that. Ooo an my neighbor usually wears nice bikini......just kidding
customer_reviews.author: Adam Zawistowski

customer_reviews.title: I love flying it but be careful I found out I ...
customer_reviews.text: This Quadcopter hasn't let me down yet. I love flying it but be careful I found out I live 4.5 miles from an airport which means I have to drive down the road to fly it. I also recommend you get a AMA membership. You also need to know there is care needed in taking care of the batteries never leave them at full charge and so on.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Williams

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this
customer_reviews.text: We got it for our business. It's cool takes good pictures, Great stabilization. The home feature works great.
customer_reviews.author: Amanda J. Seay

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Received on Thursday and now it's Sunday. Been flying it everyday. So far, I'm loving it! Easy to fly and set up. I live in Oklahoma "where the wind comes sweeping down the plains" and it handles very well!! When you let go of the controls, it just hovers, barely moves at all in pretty decent winds. I got the extra battery bundle, that's a must, 20 minutes goes by way too fast. In fact I'm going to order 2 more batteries. Since I have not had it that long, I will update my review if something changes.
customer_reviews.author: Shane Edmounds

customer_reviews.title: No problems, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality, an order of magnitude better than the previous iteration in terms of stability, battery durability, ease of use, and flight. Camera is great, and the user interface is high quality too. However, you should know that the app is absolutely required to unlock the drone, and the app absolutely requires a 64 bit tablet, like the new Air or Air2. They did not make that obvious to a new buyer.
customer_reviews.author: pstaffor

product_meta.title: DJI Phantom 3 Professional Quadcopter 4K UHD Video Camera Drone
product_meta.description:
The Phantom 3 Professional continues the proud tradition of DJI's Phantom series and brings several important innovations to the Phantom's rich feature set. The Phantom 3 Professional carries a fully stabilized 3-axis 4k UHD video camera for smooth, crisp videos and still photos. To allow you to see what the drone sees, DJI has engineered a new generation of their Lightbridge technology that allows 720p HD digital streaming of live video directly from the drone. You can control the camera and see video in real time as you fly and you can even share the video using the DJI Pilot app's advanced features. To aid indoor flying, the Phantom 3 Professional includes an integrated array of optical and ultrasonic sensors call Vision Positioning that allows you to fly precisely indoors without a GPS signal. The Phantom 3 Professional includes all the tried-and-true features you'd expect from a DJI drone, including GPS navigation with auto takeoffs and auto landings, intelligent high power flight battery, a built-in safety database of no fly zones, and a powerful mobile app for your iOS or Android device.

Note: DJI has locked your Phantom from being able to even start the motor if you live within a 15 mile radius of the White House. This encompasses not only D.C. but much of Prince Georges County, Arlington, Fairfax, Silver Spring, Falls Church and Montgomery County. DJI does not warn you of this prior to purchase. Outside of this 15 mile radius, the drone works great, but be aware, that if you bought it and live within the restricted zone, you will not be able to fly it, even on your own property. 

SET CONTAINS:


 * Aircraft Body (1)
 * Remote Controller (1)
 * Propeller Pairs (4)
 * Intelligent Flight Battery (1)
 * Battery Charger (1)
 * Power Cable (1)
 * Phantom 3 Professional / Advanced Safety Guidelines and Disclaimer (Manual)
 * Phantom 3 Professional / Advanced Intelligent Flight Battery Safety Guidelines (Manual)
 * Phantom 3 Professional Quick Start Guide (Manual)
 * Gimbal Clamp (1)
 * Vibration Absorbers (4)
 * 16GB Micro-SD Card (1)
 * Micro-USB Cable (1)
 * Anti-drop Kit (2)
 * Landing Pads (4)
 * Propeller Wrench (1)
 * Stickers (5 - Gold, Silver, Red, Blue, Pink)
feature_bullets: 4k UHD video recording with fully stabilized 3-axis gimbal; Vision Positioning system allows stable flight indoors
Lightbridge digital streaming allows live viewing of 720p video (full resolution video is simultaneously recorded on the internal microSD card)
Included flight battery and rechargable remote controller means this system is ready to fly out of the box. Flying this product is restricted within 15 miles radius of the White House.
DJI Pilot app for iOS and Android allows live viewing and complete camera control (phone/tablet sold separately; see DJI's website for compatible models)
Kindly refer all the Tutorial Videos given in the Image Section on the Catalog before use for the proper training.
